articles.title: Absolute Ablution's rebranding delivers 75 quality leads in just 2 months with Cape Marketing Agency
articles.summary: Cape Marketing Agency enhanced Absolute Ablution's online presence through a strategic website design and Google Ads campaign, resulting in a significant increase of 75 high-quality leads within two months. Absolute Ablution invested R12,902.32 in Google Ads between August and September 2025 and achieved an average cost per lead of R172.03.

articles.title: Day 3 of Amazon October Prime Day is ending soon - 50 best last-minute deals up to 69% off on iPads, headphones and more
articles.author: Kayla Kuefler
articles.summary: Amazon is hosting Prime Big Deal Days, offering discounts on products from brands such as Apple, Ninja, Sony, and JBL. Specific deals include savings on electronics, home & kitchen items, beauty products, and Amazon devices & accessories. Some of the discounted products are: Blink Video Doorbell, Lierac Phytolastil Stretch Mark Removal Serum, Sony Wireless Headphones, JBL Vibe Beam True Wireless Earbuds, Tineco Floor ONE Stretch S6 Cordless Wet Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Nespresso Vertuo Plus Coffee and Espresso Machine.

articles.title: TYPEBEA Bond Repair review: Rita Ora's glossy hair care range
articles.author: Marina Tatas
articles.summary: TYPEBEA, a haircare brand launched in 2024, has introduced the Bond Repair Range, a four-step system designed to improve hair smoothness, health, dryness, and frizz. The range includes the R1 Pre-Wash Damage Repair Mask ($50), R2 Damage Repair Shampoo ($40), R3 Damage Repair Conditioner ($40), and R4 Intense Repair Leave-In Treatment ($80), with the leave-in treatment considered the hero product.

articles.title: IM Presented by MG Motor: Model range guide
articles.author: Car Expert
articles.summary: IM presented by MG Motor is launching the IM5 electric sedan and the IM6 electric SUV in Australia, targeting the premium EV market. Both models come in three trim levels, with the Platinum and Performance variants offering enhanced power, range, and faster charging capabilities. The vehicles boast features like intelligent four-wheel steering, a comprehensive touchscreen display, and advanced driver-assistance systems.

articles.title: Ninja Luxe Café Espresso machine review: Pour the perfect cup
articles.author: Tahnee-Jae Lopez-Vito
articles.summary: Ninja launched the Ninja Luxe Café, a new espresso machine that can brew hot or cold drinks, and switch between espresso coffee, filter coffee, and cold brew. The machine retails for $999.99 and includes features such as Barista Assist Technology, built-in scales and grinder, and easy-to-clean components.

articles.title: Ads for This AI Jewelry Are All over NYC. Here's Why You Should Think Twice Before You Buy It.
articles.summary: Avi Schiffmann created Friend, an AI pendant designed to be an emotional support companion. The pendant allows users to converse with it, receiving typed responses through the Friend app. It is priced at $129, but reviews indicate limited features, poor battery life, unreliable connectivity, and privacy concerns.

articles.title: Friend Review: Why I Wouldn't Buy This AI Companion Device Just Yet
articles.author: Olivia Lipski
articles.summary: Tech entrepreneur Avi Schiffmann has launched Friend, an AI pendant designed to act as an emotional support companion. Priced at $129, Friend responds to user questions and prompts through a connected app, offering personalized interactions. However, it has limitations including lack of internet access, privacy concerns, and unreliable customer service.

articles.title: This screen protector's disappearing act is impressive, but not perfect
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Screen Skinz has launched a new product called Screen Skinz Clear Screen Protector, featuring a disappearing logo design that allows users to personalize their phone screens. The screen protectors are available for iPhones and some Samsung phones, offering options like sports team logos or custom designs. While the logo mostly disappears when the screen is lit, it can be visible in dark mode or during low-light video scenes.

articles.title: 30 Walmart Products You'll Use At Least Once A Week
articles.author: Kit Stone
articles.summary: Swiffer released a new and improved sweep + mop with a collapsible handle. Dawn launched a Pumpkin Spice Platinum dish soap spray. Thyme&Table introduced a capsule coffee machine compatible with Thyme&Table espresso capsules, Nespresso capsules, and Keurig pods. Monday Haircare launched a dry shampoo with a gardenia scent and built-in keratin treatment.

articles.title: How AI is accelerating innovation in agriculture  Oct. 9, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: CNH Industrial is introducing AI-powered solutions and digital technology enhancements to its Case IH and New Holland product lines, including combines, tractors, and sprayers. These technologies aim to improve productivity, yields, and sustainability. Specifically, SenseApply™ sprayer automation uses machine vision to optimize herbicide use.

articles.title: IM Presented by MG Motor: Model range guide
articles.author: Carexpert.com.au
articles.summary: IM Presented by MG Motor is launching the IM5 electric sedan and IM6 electric SUV in Australia, targeting the premium EV segment. The vehicles offer advanced technology, sophisticated design, and competitive pricing, with three trim levels available and unique features like 'crab mode' and a digital chassis.

articles.title: Company Overview & News
articles.author: Dj Siddiqi
articles.summary: Decagon, led by CEO Jesse Zhang, offers AI-powered customer service bots designed to enhance efficiency for corporate clients like Duolingo, Hertz, Notion and Rippling. These bots assist consumers with tasks such as product returns, subscription cancellations, and ordering replacement credit cards, providing a personalized experience.

articles.title: Which smartwatch has the best safety features? I tested them all, and here's how Google fares
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Google's latest smartwatch introduces several safety features. The new features will benefit users in specific ways.

articles.title: My New Favorite Waxed Canvas Jacket Is This Armored-Up British Icon
articles.summary: Flint and Tinder has rebooted the classic Harrington jacket, aiming for improved weather protection while maintaining its original aesthetic.

articles.title: 26 Reliable Products Every Savvy Thirtysomething Will Want To Own
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff's new "Sqeezy" set introduces a cleaning paste with a versatile cleaning sponge. Gold Bond launches a neck and chest firming cream designed to pamper the décolletage. Levi's introduces pull-on skinny jeans made with a soft, stretchy fabric.

articles.title: Lucid Bots brings embodied AI to commercial painting
articles.summary: Lucid Bots Inc. has launched painting and coating capabilities for its Sherpa Drone. The drone, originally designed for cleaning exteriors, now offers modular robotics functionalities for painting and coating applications.

articles.title: King of Pops expands to north Katy with new ‘Cartrepreneur,' Vera Jones
articles.author: Contributed Report
articles.summary: King of Pops, known for its handcrafted popsicles, is launching its services in North Katy, with local resident Vera Jones joining as a Cartrepreneur. Jones will bring King of Pops' flavors like chocolate sea salt and raspberry lime to schools, parks, and community events. King of Pops carts are available for event catering and private parties.

articles.title: Google Cloud seeks workplace dominance with new AI platform
articles.author: Indianapolis Business Journal
articles.summary: Google Cloud launched Gemini Enterprise, a new product offering.

articles.title: Trash Daddy Dumpsters Launches Online Ordering for Dumpster Rentals
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Trash Daddy Dumpsters has launched a new online ordering system for dumpster rentals. This system allows customers to book dumpster deliveries quickly and conveniently with transparent, upfront pricing. The new platform aims to solve accessibility issues, allowing customers to book services anytime, catering to homeowners, contractors, and property managers.

articles.title: Tyra Banks Gets Trolled for Launching Confusing 'Hot Ice Cream' Drink: 'This Feels Like a Fever Dream'
articles.author: Stephanie Kaplan
articles.summary: Tyra Banks' ice cream shop, SMiZE & DREAM, launched a new product called "Hot Mama," which is hot ice cream that can be sipped. The product, available in two flavors, is currently available at the flagship location in Sydney, Australia, for a limited time.

articles.title: More than 40 Media Outlets From 12 Countries Join Ia Product Lab, Iapa and Google Program
articles.author: eldiario.ec
articles.summary: IAPA and Google have launched the 'AI Product Lab' initiative. This program aims to promote the adoption of artificial intelligence within media organizations across 12 countries, including Ecuador. Over 40 media outlets have joined the initiative.

articles.title: Ready Seafood Teases Full Retail Line Ahead of Launch
articles.summary: Ready Seafood is preparing to launch a full retail product line, starting with their Mini Lobster Grilled Cheeses. The company has been developing packaging, production, and retailer relationships in preparation for the launch, which is expected in the coming weeks.

articles.title: iQOO 15 launch details revealed along with official colour options, know what to expect from the device
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: iQOO will unveil the iQOO 15 smartphone on October 20 in Shenzhen, China. The flagship device will be available in four colors and powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, featuring a 6.85' 2K display with a 144Hz refresh rate. The launch will first take place in China, followed by a global launch in early December.

articles.title: Dialpad Launches Its Agentic AI Platform, Ending the Chatbot Era and Redefining the Future of Customer Service
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Dialpad launched its new Agentic AI Platform on October 9, 2025. The platform enables businesses to build autonomous AI agents for voice and text communication. These agents can understand complex requests and execute multi-step tasks across various systems using secure connectors.

articles.title: Practical Ways AI Can Simplify Your Marketing Campaigns
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: The article highlights the capabilities of AI-powered marketing platforms, including algorithms for predicting consumer behavior, generating persuasive copy, and extracting customer insights.  It emphasizes the use of AI in content creation, audience targeting, campaign optimization, and customer interaction, showcasing the shift from traditional methods to AI-augmented processes. It also mentions AI helps optimize budget allocation, provide personalized campaign delivery, and improve customer interaction and engagement.

articles.title: Iterable Earns Global Recognition as a G2 Leader Across Fall and Summer Reports
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Iterable announced it has been recognized as a category leader in G2's Fall and Summer Reports. Iterable is launching a new AI Agent designed to revolutionize CRM management by automating key tasks and providing real-time insights, analytics, and predictions.

articles.title: The new Nissan LEAF is back in the UK and it's nothing like the old one
articles.summary: Nissan launched its new LEAF in the UK, featuring a crossover SUV-like design.

articles.title: Walmart extends Prime Day with Samsung phone deals
articles.author: Oyewale Damilare
articles.summary: Walmart is offering discounts on Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy Z Flip7 FE, and Galaxy S25 Edge. These phones boast features like Galaxy AI, FlexWindow, and enhanced camera capabilities, providing performance and creativity, at discounted prices.

articles.title: PepsiCo, fresh off a strong third quarter, says new products will soon boost customer demand
articles.author: Detroit news
articles.summary: PepsiCo is planning to boost consumer demand by introducing new products. These include protein-infused Starbucks coffee, low-sugar Gatorade, and Doritos with all-natural ingredients. This initiative aims to capture disproportionately growing market segments.

articles.title: Ferrari shares get a shock as carmaker goes electric
articles.author: The Times/The Sunday Times
articles.summary: A company has unveiled its first product.

articles.title: Katalon Named a Visionary in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for AI-Augmented Software Testing Tools
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Katalon has been recognized as a Visionary in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for AI-Augmented Software Testing for its AI-native testing platform. This platform includes TrueTest for autonomous test creation, Studio for advanced AI capabilities, and TestOps and TestCloud for enterprise-scale orchestration, enabling faster and smarter testing.

articles.title: Katalon Named a Visionary in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for AI-Augmented Software Testing Tools
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Katalon has been recognized as a Visionary in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for AI-Augmented Software Testing Tools. Katalon's AI-native platform includes TrueTest for autonomous test creation, Studio for AI capabilities, and TestOps and TestCloud for enterprise-scale orchestration. Katalon continues to invest in its AI-native Katalon Platform that moves far beyond traditional automation.

articles.title: AI brands are using pop-ups and events to build awareness and trust
articles.author: Eleanor Hawkins
articles.summary: Anthropic launched a pop-up cafe in New York City to promote Claude, their AI tool. IBM hosted a multi-day activation in Madison Square Park alongside the U.S. Open to showcase their AI capabilities, aiming to re-evaluate IBM and connect the company with AI in the minds of the visitors.

articles.title: Morrisons Now delivery service to roll out to 420 stores
articles.author: Jade Wright
articles.summary: Morrisons launched 'Morrisons Now', a new service offering delivery within an hour. Customers can order from Morrisons.com with a delivery fee of £4.50 and a minimum order value of £15. This service allows customers to track orders, use 'Instant Shop,' and earn More Card points.

articles.title: Morrisons shoppers can order 30 items and get them in 1 hour with new service
articles.author: Jade Wright
articles.summary: Morrisons has launched Morrisons Now, a new service offering speedy delivery of fresh food in as little as one hour. Customers can order through Morrisons.com, track their order in real-time, and earn More Card points. The service is available now with a delivery fee of £4.50 and a minimum order value of £15.

articles.title: Vercel: $300 Million Series F At $9.3 Billion Valuation Raised For Scaling AI Cloud
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Vercel has launched v0 Mobile in public beta, expecting general availability in October. This mobile application enables developers to build applications using voice prompts and camera inputs while on the move. Vercel also plans to advance its AI Gateway, AI Sandbox, and AI SDK.

articles.title: PepsiCo Bets on Innovation and Natural Ingredients to Revive Slowing Sales Amid Investor Pressure – [your]NEWS
articles.author: Emmanuel Ogbonna
articles.summary: PepsiCo is launching several new products and reformulations, including protein-infused Starbucks coffee, low-sugar Gatorade, and a new generation of Doritos made with all-natural ingredients under the 'NKD' line, and reformulated Tostitos and Lay's products to appeal to health-conscious consumers. The company is also experiencing success with Pepsi Zero Sugar and new Mountain Dew flavors, such as Summer Freeze and Dragon Fruit, driving growth in its beverage division.

articles.title: LATT SEO Unveils AI-Powered SEO to Boost Industrial B2B Brands
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: LATT SEO launched a new AI-driven search and content program on October 9, 2025, designed for industrial, manufacturing, and distribution companies. The program focuses on entity-focused keyword research, structured-data implementation, and AI-optimized content to improve visibility on search engines and AI-powered search assistants.

articles.title: Volkswagen selects Nuvei Corporation to launch payment solutions for vehicles
articles.summary: Volkswagen will leverage Nuvei's product. This scaling solution will be implemented across additional markets, focusing on Latin America.

articles.title: BYD Guyana Introduces Super Affordable Electric SUV
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: GT Automotive has introduced the new BYD Yuan Pro, a 100% electric compact SUV, in Guyana. The vehicle is priced at GYD $5.5 million, features a range of up to 410 km, and is equipped with advanced technology and safety features. The BYD Yuan Pro is available in various colors and customers can schedule a test drive.

articles.title: New car showroom experience coming to Taunton town centre
articles.author: Declan O'Reilly
articles.summary: BYD South West is set to open the BYD Taunton Experience Centre in Taunton town center, an extension of its existing showroom. This new location will showcase BYD's range of electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles, with customers able to explore models and book test drives. The official opening date and launch event details are expected soon.

articles.title: Sky drops £300 off Google's new Pixel Fold handset - only if you do this
articles.author: Sky Mobile
articles.summary: Sky is offering a deal on Google's Pixel 10 Pro Fold, providing an extra £300 off when customers trade in their old phone. Existing Sky Mobile customers swapping to the Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold will receive a £300 bill credit. The phone features advanced AI, a brighter eight-inch screen, and enhanced durability.

articles.title: GoDaddy Brings AI-Powered Digital Ads to Entrepreneurs, Empowering Faster Online Growth  Oct. 9, 2025 15:12
articles.summary: GoDaddy has launched its new Digital Ads feature with GoDaddy Airo® in nine new English-language markets. This AI-powered tool allows small business owners to create and manage Google Ad campaigns without prior expertise. Airo drafts ad copy, selects keywords, and structures campaigns, all within the GoDaddy Digital Ads dashboard.

articles.title: GoDaddy Expands AI-Powered Digital Ads Feature to Empower Entrepreneurs in 9 Markets
articles.author: Johannesburg
articles.summary: GoDaddy has expanded its AI-powered Digital Ads feature through GoDaddy Airo® to nine new English-language markets. This tool aims to make digital advertising accessible and effortless for small business owners by using AI to create and manage Google Ad campaigns. The GoDaddy Airo Digital Ads tool is designed to remove the complexity of digital marketing.

articles.title: Zoom Phone hits 10 million seats, transforming how businesses connect in the AI era
articles.summary: Zoom Communications' Zoom Phone, launched in 2019, has surpassed 10 million seats globally, signifying a major milestone. Zoom Phone is an AI-first cloud phone system and has become one of the fastest-growing cloud telephony solutions and offers enterprise-grade features and AI-first innovation which resulted in significant cost savings for users like Sydney Film Festival, achieving 81% savings.

articles.title: The fearless strategies behind the growth of Baby a GoGo
articles.author: Dara Anderson Johnson
articles.summary: Lindsey Shores, founder of Baby a GoGo, launched a diaper kit and magic wipes after identifying a need during a personal travel experience. Baby a GoGo products are now sold in airports, stores, and are included in Delta's recovery service program, after she successfully pitched her product. Lindsey plans to expand Baby a GoGo to more locations and introduce new products.

articles.title: Flintiq Launches "Review-for-Reward" Campaign to Celebrate Couples and Shared Self-Care Moments
articles.summary: Flintiq launched the "Review-for-Reward" campaign to promote the Jelly Bath Collection. The campaign invites customers to share reviews or videos of their Flintiq products on social media in exchange for a complimentary Flintiq item. Flintiq offers a 30-day satisfaction guarantee and free shipping within the U.S.

articles.title: LiveRamp Partners with Dappier to Unlock New Revenue for Publishers with Personalized Ads embedded in AI Answers
articles.summary: Dappier and LiveRamp have partnered to introduce personalized advertisements within AI chat and search experiences. This collaboration enables publishers to monetize AI interactions with high-intent ads driven by user conversation and page context, powered by LiveRamp's identity solutions. The integration allows marketers to connect with customers at critical points in their journeys within emerging AI ecosystems.

articles.title: The Social: The Best Splurge-Worthy Finds From The 2025 Amazon Prime Big Deal Days Sale In Canada
articles.author: Alice Prendergast
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Big Deal Days offers discounted prices on various products. New Cuisinart coffee makers, Listerine breath fresheners, split air fryers, Neutrogena skincare, sunrise alarm clocks, and bidet attachments are among the highlighted items, providing consumers opportunities to purchase new or upgraded products across different categories.

articles.title: 31 Travel Products You'll Probably Wish You Had 10 Trips Ago
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: Gillette introduces an on-the-go razor, emphasizing its compact size and superior quality compared to disposable alternatives. Beis presents a backpack designed with ample pockets and convenient features, functioning as a mini suitcase. Tushbaby offers a carrier for toddlers, easing strain on parents' backs with added storage for essentials. LeakLocks launches Toiletry Skins to prevent spills in luggage, ensuring toiletries remain contained and prevent staining clothes during travel.

articles.title: SoftOrbits AI: Cut $5/Image Costs & Level E-commerce with Batch Processing
articles.author: Yucatan Times
articles.summary: SoftOrbits introduces AI-powered photo editing tools, including Photo Background Remover and AI Photo Editor, designed for e-commerce businesses. These tools automate complex edits like background cleanup and resizing, enabling users to process 100 product images in under 5 minutes. By using local AI processing, SoftOrbits eliminates recurring subscription fees and ensures data security.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 70 listed on website of retailer ahead of launch, know specifications
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Motorola will launch the Motorola Edge 70 smartphone globally on November 5. The smartphone features a 6.67-inch OLED display, 50MP front and dual 50MP rear cameras, Qualcomm's Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, 12GB RAM, up to 512GB storage, and a 4800mAh battery with 68W wired and 15W wireless charging.

articles.title: Xometry Launches New Workcenter Experience, Empowering Manufacturing Partners to Accept Jobs ...
articles.author: Xometry
articles.summary: Xometry, Inc. has released its new Workcenter Mobile App. This app is designed to help suppliers within the Xometry partner network manage job offers, production workflows, and shop performance. The app connects partners to the Workcenter platform and the expansive job board directly from a smartphone.

articles.title: Just don't call it Liquid Glass.
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Vivo is launching OriginOS 6, its latest version of Android, globally along with the X300 phones. OriginOS 6 replaces Vivo's international offering, Funtouch OS.

articles.title: Lou's Buns, 'Gourmet cinnamon buns', now available in L'Enfant Paza!
articles.author: Prince
articles.summary: Lou's Buns, a bakery specializing in gourmet cinnamon buns made in D.C., is launching at multiple locations including L'Enfant Plaza, Western Market, and Old Town Market Alexandria. Founded in 2017, the bakery aims to provide 'The best buns you've ever had.'

articles.title: Propel Software Accelerates Adoption of Agentic AI for PLM, QMS & PIM with Early Customers Using Live Data
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Propel announces Propel One first customer cohort, combining its unified product thread with Salesforce Agentforce's security. Propel One's AI enables users to leverage trusted, relevant product data. Propel will discuss its latest technology including Propel One at Dreamforce 2025.

articles.title: Zoom Phone hits 10 million seats, transforming how businesses connect in the AI era
articles.summary: Zoom Phone, launched in 2019, has rapidly grown as a cloud telephony solution. It offers enterprise-grade features, flexibility, and AI-first innovation built on Zoom's platform, designed to improve collaboration and customer engagement.

articles.title: Aeston West Launches in Beauty Market Offering a Duality by Design Principle
articles.author: Aeston West
articles.summary: Aeston West is launching a clinically grounded and botanically informed skincare product range in the beauty market. The product formulas are designed to support the skin's underlying systems for long-term results, correcting visible damage and defending against the biological triggers of premature aging.

articles.title: Walmart is offering a rare deal on the XL Ninja SLUSHi this week
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a limited-time discount on the Ninja SLUSHi 88oz Professional Frozen Drink Maker, reducing the price from $349.99 to $299. The Ninja SLUSHi uses RapidChill Technology and dispenses frozen drinks directly into a glass and features multiple settings for various frozen drinks.

articles.title: Syntax DnA³ Unites AI, Automation, and Analytics to Drive Smarter, Faster Enterprises Français
articles.summary: Syntax has launched Syntax DnA³, a Digital Innovation Center of Excellence that integrates AI, automation, and analytics. This new offering aims to help organizations unlock the full value of their data and achieve faster business transformation. Syntax will showcase Syntax DnA³ at Oracle AI World 2025.

articles.title: HMD to Bring Back Nokia's Toughest Phone with a Modern Twist
articles.author: Afaq Wajdan Malik
articles.summary: HMD is preparing to launch an updated version of the Nokia 800 Tough, featuring a USB-C port, updated KaiOS 3.1, and improved app support. The rugged phone maintains its IP68 water and dust resistance and MIL-STD-810 military-grade certification.

articles.title: 30 TikTok Products That Deliver Actual Results
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: Multiple companies have introduced new products. Dr. Melaxin launched "Peel Shot," an exfoliator with rice water and niacinamide. The Pink Stuff released "Sqeezy" sponge set paired with their miracle paste. Medicube introduced Glow Facial Serum, a spot care treatment with tranexamic acid and niacinamide. Wonderskin launched transfer-proof lip stain.

articles.title: GoDaddy Brings Artificial Intelligence (AI)-Powered Digital Ads to Entrepreneurs, Empowering Faster Online Growth
articles.author: APO
articles.summary: GoDaddy expands its Digital Ads feature with GoDaddy Airo® to nine new English-language markets including Ireland, Malaysia, New Zealand, Pakistan, Philippines, Singapore, South . This aims to help small businesses reach new customers online by simplifying the creation of effective ads.

articles.title: SEIDOR Opentrends Launches Industry Ebook Revealing How AI Is Disrupting the $30 Billion RV Market
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: SEIDOR Opentrends has released the "AI Evolution in the RV Industry: 2025 Ebook", a free resource to help RV manufacturers adapt to industry changes. The ebook introduces practical frameworks like the AI Stack Starter™ to help organizations implement AI solutions.

articles.title: Creatio Recognized as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for B2B Marketing Automation Platforms
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Creatio has introduced Creatio Marketing, a new marketing platform that accelerates the lead-to-revenue cycle using no-code and AI. The platform offers AI-powered automation for campaign activities, content generation, and analytics on a single platform. With natural language as the default interface, marketers can design and execute campaigns, orchestrate customer journeys, and create dashboards without overdependency on IT.

articles.title: GroundTruth Partners with Place Exchange to Expand Into Digital Out-of-Home With Measurable Foot Traffic Attribution
articles.author: Ground Truth
articles.summary: GroundTruth launched its Digital Out-of-Home (DOOH) solution, powered by Place Exchange. This enables advertisers to buy premium DOOH inventory with precise targeting and visitation attribution similar to other channels. This new solution connects DOOH ad exposure to real-world store visits.

articles.title: Google introduces AI Mode searches in Romanian
articles.author: Romania Insider
articles.summary: Google has launched its new AI-assisted search mode, AI Mode, in Romania and in the Romanian language. Powered by Gemini 2.5, AI Mode functions as a distinct option within the Google search engine, allowing users to ask complex questions and receive AI-generated responses with the possibility of exploring the topic further. The availability will be rolled out gradually, and AI Mode is now available in over 200 countries and territories.

articles.title: TIME Best Inventions Hall of Fame
articles.author: The People’s Network
articles.summary: Apple released the iPhone in 2007, expanding its product roster to touchscreens and cellular signals. iRobot launched Roomba in 2002, automating vacuuming with a sensor-guided robot.  In 2007, Google added Street View to Google Maps, offering street-level views.

articles.title: Tyra Banks has fans convinced she's lost it as the supermodel announces she's selling 'hot ice cream' drinks at her Aussie frozen dessert store: 'Who asked for this?'
articles.author: MARTA JARY
articles.summary: Tyra Banks' SMiZE & DREAM store in Sydney has launched a new product called 'Hot Mama,' a hot ice cream drink. This 'silky ice cream that you can drink' took over a year to develop and is available in flavors like Fairy Dough.

articles.title: ITV launches GenAI Ads Manager powered by Magnite's streamr.ai
articles.author: Julian Clover
articles.summary: ITV has launched a new GenAI Ads Manager platform powered by Magnite's streamr.ai technology. This platform enables SMEs to automatically generate broadcast-quality commercials using their existing online content, with creative input from ITV's team. The aim is to simplify and scale access to television advertising for smaller brands.

articles.title: BABY born® Unveils Magical Princess Collection, Available Only at Target
articles.summary: MGA Entertainment's BABY born brand has introduced the BABY born Princess Collection and Cozy Cuties, which are now available at Target. These new dolls and accessories aim to foster compassionate and imaginative play, helping children develop social and emotional skills. The brand anticipates its 35th anniversary in 2026.

articles.title: Google Search Live now available in India: Understanding the differences with Gemini Live
articles.summary: Google has launched Search Live, an AI-powered conversational search feature, in India. The feature, available within AI Mode on the Google app, allows users to interact with Google via voice and camera for real-time answers. It combines Gemini's AI capabilities and is built on the technologies from Google's Project Astra.

articles.title: iQOO 15 set to launch in India soon: Check expected price, features and more
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: iQOO is preparing to launch its next-generation flagship smartphone, the iQOO 15, with expected debut in India between November 15 and November 25, 2025. The iQOO 15 will feature a 6.85-inch QHD AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, a dual-camera setup, and a 7000mAh battery with rapid charging support.

articles.title: Ninja kitchen gadget that is 'surprisingly quiet' now less than £100
articles.author: Stephanie Colderick
articles.summary: Ninja's cold press juicer machine is now available for £99 at Amazon, a price drop from £129.99, saving shoppers 24%. The Ninja jc151uk cold press juicer is also selling for £99.99 at Argos and John Lewis. The juicer is praised for its quiet operation, smooth juice production, and efficient extraction.

articles.title: Nominations Open for Ghana Digital Awards 2025: Celebrating Creativity and Innovation
articles.summary: LoversGH Network Ltd, in partnership with Mamaitaly Ventures, has launched the Ghana Digital Awards (GDA) 2025, a platform to recognize innovation in Ghana's digital and creative industries. Nominations are now open until November 2025 for eligible individuals, creatives, and brands via the official portal.

articles.title: Dump your ironing board for Lidl's new middle aisle gadget that leaves clothes crease-free AND banishes dust
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Silvercrest Beige Garment Steamer for £14.99. This handheld gadget removes creases from garments and can be used vertically. It features a 250ml removable water tank, a 220cm cable, a brush attachment, heating indicator lights, and an auto shut-off. The product has a three-year warranty and will be available from October 16.

articles.title: Battlefield 6 Launch Week Twitch Drops Revealed
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Battlefield 6 introduces new Twitch drops, including Soldier Skins and Weapons. These drops provide players with new cosmetic and functional items, enhancing the gaming experience.

articles.title: 🗣️ AISW #079: Alicia Yanez, USA-based senior product & ops leader
articles.author: Karen Smiley
articles.summary: Alicia Yanez, in an interview, discusses her experiences using AI and machine learning in various companies. At Walmart, she helped build a real-time driver matching system to improve last-mile delivery. At Etsy, she worked on building a supervised learning model to make more precise transit predictions, leading to significant improvements in gross merchandise sales.

articles.title: Holland America Line Goes Glam with Cruising's First Lipstick Blending Bar at Sea
articles.author: Rio Grande Sun
articles.summary: Blend Bar introduces a new experience allowing guests to create customized lipsticks or glosses.

articles.title: Nutella is launching its first-ever advent calendar — but it'll cost you £35
articles.author: Courtney Pochin
articles.summary: Ferrero is launching a Nutella advent calendar for the first time, containing mini portions of Nutella spread, biscuits, B-ready bars, Nutella & Go pots, and festive extras. Additionally, Ferrero has launched a new plant-based version of Nutella made with chickpeas, available in Sainsbury's supermarkets.

articles.title: Segai Unveils Revolutionary Product SyncOne: The AI Intimate Device That "Sees" Videos and Real-Time Synchronizes Actions to Redefine Intimacy
articles.author: Segai
articles.summary: Segai Innovation has launched SyncOne, an intelligent adult device that combines AI real-time video analysis with an open API platform. SyncOne analyzes video content in real time and adjusts device actions, aiming to bridge the gap between virtual and reality. The product has already won the iF Design Award and K-Design Award.

articles.title: ⚡PhonePe Unveils Next-Gen SmartSpeaker With Integrated Card Payments
articles.summary: PhonePe launched its next-generation SmartSpeaker, the PhonePe SmartPOD, at the Global Fintech Fest 2025. This hybrid device is designed to address the payment needs of merchants and customers in India, showcasing PhonePe's dedication to developing practical solutions.

articles.title: GYS Launches New Bamboo Fiber Loungewear Collection, Redefining Home Comfort
articles.author: GYS Pajamas
articles.summary: GYS, a sustainable sleepwear brand, launched its new Bamboo Fiber Loungewear Collection. The collection features versatile designs made from bamboo fiber, emphasizing comfort, modern aesthetics, and eco-conscious values. It is available worldwide through GYS's official website and select retail partners.

articles.title: Save up to $200 on this OnePlus Pad 3 bundle - here's how to qualify
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: OnePlus released its latest flagship Android tablet. As part of a new deal, customers can receive a free gift with purchase of the product.

articles.title: Rankpage Launches New AI-Driven SEO Solutions to Accelerate Malaysia's Digital Growth in 2025
articles.author: Rankpage Sdn Bhd
articles.summary: Rankpage Sdn Bhd has launched its next-generation AI-powered SEO solutions designed to help Malaysian businesses. The new service suite integrates Gemini AI forecasting and advanced algorithm optimization to strengthen online visibility, performance, and sustainable growth for brands competing in local and international markets. Rankpage also offers a complete range of digital services designed to support businesses at every stage of growth, including SEO services, enterprise SEO, and e-commerce SEO.

articles.title: Reliance revives Tamil Nadu personal-care brand Velvette with Krithi Shetty as face
articles.summary: Reliance Consumer Products Limited has relaunched the Velvette personal-care brand, featuring updated soaps, shampoos, and lotions. These products incorporate traditional formulations with new Aqualoc Technology to enhance moisture. Krithi Shetty is the brand's new ambassador.

articles.title: Google's new AI mode is bad news for publishers, but has opportunities for marketers
articles.author: Dan Barrett
articles.summary: Google has launched 'AI Mode' to enhance search with AI, allowing users to ask complex questions. Additionally, Google is testing 'Ads in AI Overviews' in the US, offering marketers new advertising opportunities via Google's Performance Max. Google is advising marketers about opportunities to be displayed on pages with query results.

articles.title: 35 Money-Saving Products To Invest In
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff introduced its new "Sqeezy" sponge set for cleaning projects. Oxo launched its compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer for making cold brew in five minutes. Bissell released a multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner for stain removal.

articles.title: ABB celebrates half a century of innovation and energy efficiency with variable speed drives
articles.author: World Cement
articles.summary: ABB's Low Voltage Variable Speed Drive (VSD) is celebrating its 50th anniversary this month. The VSD was first introduced to the market 50 years ago.

articles.title: MTS launches new voicemail service 'Calls to Chat'
articles.summary: MTS, a Russian operator, has launched 'Call to Chat,' a new voicemail service. This service transfers unanswered calls to a text interface, allowing users to leave messages. The service uses AI and offers contextually adapted template responses within the My MTS application.

articles.title: Don't buy a coffee machine until you see this £450 dream Ninja appliance
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Luxe Cafe Premier, a new all-in-one coffee machine. It features a Barista Assist system, auto-frothing wand, built-in grinder with 25 settings, and guided tamping system. Currently, QVC offers an exclusive Cyber Blue color option with a £100 discount and free shipping.

articles.title: Nissan's upcoming SUV is a baby Patrol called the Tekton
articles.summary: Nissan has confirmed and teased an entirely new model, the Tekton, a subcompact crossover inspired by the Nissan Patrol, set to debut next year. The vehicle will initially be manufactured in India in partnership with Renault, with plans for future export to select global markets, spearheading Nissan's growth in India.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold review: I spent a week with the toughest folding phone yet
articles.author: Jon Mundy
articles.summary: Google has launched the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a foldable smartphone featuring a dust-proof design and magnetic wireless charging. Available globally from October 9, 2025, the Pixel 10 Pro Fold includes a 6.4-inch external screen and an 8-inch internal display, offering improved brightness and running on the Tensor G5 chip with Android 16.

articles.title: Kärcher Launched WD 3 – 17L, Now Manufactured Locally in India
articles.summary: Kärcher India has launched the WD 3–17L, a wet-and-dry vacuum cleaner manufactured in India. It features a 17-liter capacity, a 1000W motor, and is designed for both wet and dry spills in homes, garages, and balconies. The WD 3–17L is available through Kärcher's Webshop, Amazon, Flipkart, and major retail outlets nationwide.

articles.title: Lamborghini enters the maritime sector with the launch of a 30-meter luxury yacht inspired by its supercars
articles.author: Kamera One
articles.summary: Lamborghini launched the Tecnomar for Lamborghini 101FT, a 30-meter luxury yacht. This nautical design, unveiled on September 24, 2025, draws inspiration from Lamborghini's supercars, combining speed and exclusivity.

articles.title: GoDaddy Brings AI-Powered Digital Ads to Entrepreneurs, Empowering Faster Online Growth
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: GoDaddy is expanding its AI-powered Digital Ads feature, GoDaddy Airo®, to nine new English-language markets, including Ireland, Malaysia, New Zealand, Pakistan, Philippines, Singapore, South Africa, and the United Arab Emirates. This tool allows small business owners to easily create and manage Google Ad campaigns.

articles.title: From dawn till dusk and beyond: How REDMI 15's 7000mAh battery keeps you going
articles.author: thecableng
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched the REDMI 15 smartphone in Nigeria, featuring a large battery, immersive display, and a 50MP AI dual camera system. The REDMI 15 is now available in Nigeria through authorized Xiaomi stores, including Finet, Raya, 3C Hub, and Slot, with a focus on affordability and value for money.

articles.title: Wadan launches Seraph, the second project within a month
articles.author: Partner Content
articles.summary: Wadan Developments launched Seraph by Wadan, a 16-story residential development in Dubai Land Residence Complex, featuring studios, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom fully furnished apartments with smart-home technology. The launch event showcased the project's amenities, including a rooftop pool, wellness areas, co-working lounges, and app-based control of lighting and security via the Wadan mobile app.

articles.title: How can you move from Gmail to Zoho Mail? Here's a step-by-step guide
articles.author: Kanishka Singharia
articles.summary: Zoho Mail, a homegrown email service, is gaining popularity as an alternative to Gmail, offering privacy-focused and ad-free experience. It provides features like custom domain support, a streamlined interface, and professional-grade tools at affordable rates for both individuals and businesses. Switching to Zoho Mail from Gmail is made simple with a migration wizard to import emails and contacts.

articles.title: 30 Affordable Fashion Swaps So Good, The Expensive Versions Will Soon Feel Like A Distant Memory
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Affordable alternatives to popular brands' products are introduced, including pajamas (similar to Piyama), sunglasses, socks (similar to Aritzia), bracelets (similar to Cartier), walking shoes (similar to Hokas), biker shorts (similar to Lululemon), underwear (similar to Victoria's Secret), joggers (similar to Lululemon), bags (similar to Polène), and accessories. These products aim to provide similar style and functionality at a lower price point than their more expensive counterparts.

articles.title: Google's new AI feature lets you try shoes virtually
articles.summary: Google has introduced a new AI-powered 'try on' feature to its shopping platform, enabling users to visualize how shoes would look on them without uploading foot pictures. This capability, initially used in the Doppl app, is now available for shoes and is expanding to other clothing types in Australia, Canada, and Japan.

articles.title: Nissan Tekton Vs Renault Duster: Head-To-Head Design Comparison
articles.summary: Nissan is launching the Tekton SUV in 2026, featuring a futuristic design with C-shaped LED DRLs and a connected LED light bar. Renault will also launch the new-generation Duster in 2026, retaining its rugged SUV stance with Y-shaped LED headlamps and taillamp elements.

articles.title: Your Samsung phone can now detect nudity in incoming videos: Here's how
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Google has launched an update to its Messages app on Samsung phones, extending its Sensitive Content Warnings system to include videos. The app will now scan incoming and outgoing videos for nudity and display warnings, alerting users before they open such media. This feature, rolled out as part of the October 2025 Play Services update, requires activation in the app settings.

articles.title: Melbourne Web Digital Redesigned Their Website to Help Small Businesses
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Melbourne Web Digital has redesigned its website to offer more accessible digital marketing services to small and medium-sized businesses. The updated website highlights services like Local SEO, Small Business SEO, and industry-specific approaches for retail, hospitality, and real estate.  It also includes transparent timelines, flexible pricing, and a free consultation option.

articles.title: Google Rolls Out Search Live Feature, AI Mode Now Supports 7 New Regional Languages In India
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Google has launched its "Search Live" feature in India, which was previously available only in the US. Users can now point their phone's camera at objects and get answers to their queries by speaking or typing directly into the app. Additionally, Google has expanded the AI Search Mode by introducing support for seven Indian languages and expanding to over 40 new countries.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland Announces New Supply Deal With Galmere Fresh Foods
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland has announced a new €7 million supply deal with Galmere Fresh Foods. Galmere Fresh Foods has expanded its range to 16 lines of soups, sauces, meal bowls, salads and dips across Lidl's own-brand Meadow Fresh and Deluxe lines.

articles.title: The Best Amazon Prime Day deals we found still in stock and worth getting ahead of Black Friday
articles.author: Britt Ross
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Big Deal Days offered significant discounts on a wide range of products. Notable deals included 40% off Tarte Shape Tape Concealer, 44% off Dyson V8 Plus, 50% off Philips 3200 Series Espresso Machine, and substantial savings on items from Shark, Anker, Sony, and other brands across various categories like tech, home, and fashion.

articles.title: Explore the updated version of WaterLINE
articles.author: McPherson Media Group
articles.summary: Goulburn-Murray Water is inviting customers to attend drop-in sessions. These sessions explore the new version of Goulburn-Murray Water's online water ordering system, WaterLINE.

articles.title: New Renault Duster SUV Caught On Test — Here's What You Can Expect
articles.summary: Renault is testing the next-generation Duster SUV, expected to launch in early 2026. The new Duster shares the CMF-B platform with the Nissan Tekton, and it may feature turbocharged petrol engines, advanced connectivity, and ADAS. Pricing is expected to be competitive with Hyundai Creta and Kia Seltos.

articles.title: Don't buy a coffee machine until you see this £450 dream Ninja appliance
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Luxe Cafe Premier, a coffee machine offering espresso, filter coffee, and cold brew options. It features Ninja's Barista Assist system for automated adjustments and an auto-frothing wand, along with a built-in grinder. A Cyber Blue edition is exclusively available through QVC with a £100 saving.

articles.title: Don't buy a coffee machine until you see this £450 dream Ninja appliance
articles.summary: Ninja introduced the Luxe Cafe Premier, a new product promising café-quality espresso, filter coffee, and cold brew. The Luxe Cafe Premier offers these beverages at the touch of a button. An exclusive Cyber Blue edition is available via QVC.

articles.title: Light-years ahead: TechnologyOne unveils game changing AI system
articles.author: Chris Herde
articles.summary: TechnologyOne has launched PLUS, a new enterprise AI system designed to enhance business operations. This system combines natural language interface with AI to predict trends, simplify tasks, and personalize data. It aims to revolutionize organizations by offering cost savings and improved efficiency across various sectors.

articles.title: Our favorite brands for half the price: These Amazon Prime Day deals are up to 50% off
articles.summary: Amazon is celebrating the 10-year anniversary of Prime Day with deals on brands like HydroFlask, Shark, SodaStream, and Instant Pot. These deals are last-minute additions and Lightning Deals, offering over 40% off on known brands.

articles.title: SteelSeries、世界初のハイレゾ認証ゲーミングヘッドセット「Arctis Nova Elite」10月17日より順次発売Sage＆GoldとObsidian Blackの2種類
articles.summary: SteelSeries introduces the Arctis Nova Elite gaming headset, available in Sage & Gold and Obsidian Black. This product aims to target gaming enthusiasts.

articles.title: The Same Car with Two Names: Unveiling the Automotive Industry's Most Peculiar Dual-Identity Vehicles
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: The article highlights several examples of automotive rebranding, where the same vehicle is sold under different brand names to reach different market segments or leverage existing dealership networks. For instance, the Subaru BRZ/Toyota GR86 were co-developed and sold under both brands, and the Toyota Avanza is a rebadged Suzuki Ertiga for Southeast Asian markets. Such practices enable companies to reduce development costs, accelerate time to market, and increase production efficiency.

articles.title: Black Tech Products To Purchase Before ‘Prime Day' Is Done
articles.author: Ahsan Washington
articles.summary: House of Marley offers eco-friendly Bluetooth speakers and headphones made from recycled materials, providing discounts around Prime Day. SOUL Electronics crafts wireless earbuds and Bluetooth speakers with noise-canceling technology, offering bundle promotions. Mymanu is known for its CLIK earbuds that can translate over 40 languages in real time, available with Prime Day markdowns.

articles.title: Best-selling blowdry brush: BondiBoost Blowout Brush Pro drops to lowest price yet at Amazon Australia
articles.author: Holly Hampton-Thayers
articles.summary: BondiBoost is promoting its Blowout Brush Pro Hair Dryer & Hair Brush, a three-in-one tool for drying, styling, and volumizing hair. The hair tool, normally priced at $99.99, is currently on sale for $59.96 at Amazon Australia as part of the Big Deal Days sale and features 1200 watts power, 360-degree airflow vents, ionic technology, and dual bristles.

articles.title: Only a Few Hours Left to Score the 2025 Moto G Power for a Record-Low $200
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Motorola's mid-range phone, which performed well in testing, is now available with a $100 discount.

articles.title: Kärcher Begins Local Manufacturing Of WD 3–17L Vacuum Cleaner In India
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: Kärcher India has launched the WD 3–17L, a locally manufactured wet-and-dry vacuum cleaner, as part of the 'Make in India' initiative. The WD 3–17L features a 17-litre container, a 1000W motor, and is available through Kärcher's webshop, Amazon, Flipkart, and major retail outlets.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland takes a bigger bite out of Galway's Galmere Fresh Foods
articles.author: DECLAN VARLEY
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland announced a new €7 million supply deal with Galmere Fresh Foods. This deal expands Galmere's product range in Lidl stores, including new soup options like the Deluxe Immune Boosting Curried Butternut Squash Soup, High Protein Mexican Bean Soup, High Protein Chicken Soup, and Deluxe Immune Boosting Root Vegetable Soup.

articles.title: Our Favorite Pet-Friendly Robot Vac Remains $500 Off, Even After Prime Day Ended
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: The Dreame X50 Ultra was tested and succeeded. The product is currently available with a 31% discount.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch Online Adds Mario & Wario, Bubsy, and Fatal Fury Special to Super Nintendo Library
articles.author: This Gen Gaming
articles.summary: Nintendo announced the addition of three new titles to the Super Nintendo portion of its Nintendo Switch Online subscription service.

articles.title: Is this the cutest EV yet? The new Renault Twingo could be yours for around £17,000
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Renault has launched a new retro version of its Twingo car.

articles.title: AWS Unleashes 'Quick Suite,' Igniting a New Front in the Enterprise AI Wars
articles.author: The Call
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has launched 'Quick Suite,' a new agentic AI workspace. This product directly challenges competitors like Microsoft.

articles.title: M&S shoppers can snap up �330 beauty advent calendar that's 'pure luxury' for �60
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer will be offering their Beauty Advent Calendar again in 2025.
